page.title: 14Children's Games in Maltby
page.content: Most of the usual games,such as football,cricket,tennis and rounders,are played but a few unusual games are played. Many of them invented by the children themselves. One of the most popular games is called 'Slaps'. Two people play this game. One person puts their hands together and points them toward their opponent who does the same. Whoever has the first turn aims to surprise the other by suddenly slapping them on the back of their hands. If they are successful, they take another turn. If not,then it is the other person's go. Another game played by Maltby children is called 'Squashed Tomatoes' A game for any number of people. The players line up with their backs to a wall except for the one who is 'On' who aims to hit one of the others with a small ball then they are'On'.
